Uses of Class
camzup.core.Color.HueEasing

Packages that use Color.HueEasing 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Color.HueEasing in camzup.core

    Subclasses of Color.HueEasing in camzup.core 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Color.HueCCW
    Eases the hue in the counter-clockwise direction.
    static class  Color.HueCW
    Eases between hues in the clockwise direction.
    static class  Color.HueFar
    Eases between hues by the farthest clockwise direction.
    static class  Color.HueNear
    Eases between hues by the nearest clockwise direction.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Color.HueEasing 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Color.MixHsba.setHueFunc​(Color.HueEasing hueFunc)
    Sets the hue easing function.
    Constructors in camzup.core with parameters of type Color.HueEasing 
    Constructor Description
    MixHsba​(Color.HueEasing hueFunc)
    Creates a color HSBA mixing function with the given hue easing function.
    MixHsba​(Color.HueEasing hueFunc, Utils.LerpUnclamped satFunc, Utils.LerpUnclamped briFunc)
    Creates a color HSBA mixing function with the given easing functions for hue, saturation and brightness.
